_header: I believe that Christ was born of Mary the Virgin
_description: A macaronic paraphrase of the Creed — eleven 8-line stanzas

BodRawD913.First Lines:
I by leve that cryst was borne of mari the virgenCriste ys
                    Exsubstancya patri ante secula gemius…
BodRawD913.Last Lines:
…Venite benedicte I schall yow sendto my blysse endles et ad
                    vitam eternam amen
